body: Since there is already a clusterfu*k of AMA's on the forums, I might as well make too. I can sense Steven waiting to make another hide AMA's topics already. Anyway ask me what you want I'll answer it with full honesty.
body_tagged: Since there is already a clusterfu*k of AMA's on the forums, I might as well make too. I can sense Steven waiting to make another hide AMA's topics already. Anyway ask me what you want I'll answer it with full honesty.
title: Numberz AMA

replies.body:
MORE AMAs
Why the name, why not any other number
How much do you miss the good old days?
Are you a pinger? 
What's your real name?
Do you like school? Favourit subject?
Would you prefer the world to end by AI and technology or aliens??
Opinions on Howsie?
Opinions on me?

Opinions on me?

replies.body:
Why the name, why not any other number: These numberz have some kind of special meaning to me (I forget why though xD). I just liked the way this name sounds too. Really unique now since not a lot of players have all number names.
How much do you miss the good old days?: A LOT. I really miss being able to play Nebula like 2 years ago and being really crappy xD I also miss all the times I played Walls, CTH and Nexus with friends trying to prestige and get #1 alltime. I also miss Berzerk days... Minecraft just isn't the same to me anymore.
Are you a pinger?: Last time I checked my ping it was 30 something so ofc :P
What's your real name?: Anthony.
Do you like school? Favourit subject?: I'm actually one of those people who likes school. My favourite subject is cooking/foods.
Would you prefer the world to end by AI and technology or aliens??: Aliens preferably some kind kind of alien similar to Jar Jar Binks.
Opinions on Howsie?: A legend who loves My Little Pony. Didn't really talk to him that much back in the old days.
Opinions on me?: Really friendly person, great to talk to. Good at PvP and a great teammate. :D

Opinions on Howsie?: A legend who loves My Little Pony. Didn't really talk to him that much back in the old days.
Opinions on me?: Really friendly person, great to talk to. Good at PvP and a great teammate. :D

replies.body:
Hey again Semel! xd
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be and why?: That's a tough one for me cause I like a lot of different places. Probably would say New York City. Not generally a fan of large cities but the different cultures, foods and landmarks make it fascinating. ;p
What was your best experience on Avicus? And your worst experience?: Best would be winning the Omega Championship got a lot of hate for it but was truly a ton of fun. Worst would be getting demoted a few time for stupid reasons.
If you could pick only one word that best describes you, what would it be? And why?: Probably flame. I tend to hate certain people and want to burn (verbally of courses) them xD but it kind of dies out once in a while.
Opinions on me?: Awesome dude, youre always great at defending yourself in arguments (and starting them) xD. Really nice person though.

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
Where would you like to go to next time?
One person you would like to meet IRL from Avicus?
If you were the world's most powerful man, what would you do?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions on me?
Where would you like to go to next time?
One person you would like to meet IRL from Avicus?
If you were the world's most powerful man, what would you do?

replies.body:
Your opinion on me?: Known you for ages since you joined with your old account schimini (or something like that). Amazing mapmaker and staff memeber. really great person to talk with.
Also what happened to you in the last time, you seem to lost your fire..: Well I'm affraid if I post one wrong thing I'll get forum banned, so I've toned it down quite a bit since then. Since quitting MC I don't really care too much about the drama and crap like that. I still enjoy posting on the forums though. My personality chilled out after having some conversations with Para a while ago.

What was your initial intention to become a staff member?: I was really active at the time and doing a lot of mini-modding by reporting players online so I though I would give it a shot. Plus I was getting bored of playing the game at the time so moderating was a nice break.
How do you think avicus will develop in the next weeks (months, years)?: Well if Atlas does what everyone is saying Avicus could start growing again. Might take 5+ months to regain the playerbase that we lost but eventually it would br amazing.
If you could give the current admins and seniors an advice how to do their job, what would you say?: Be more interested in the community and actively post on the forums. Advertise the server. And try to keep the competitive side active.
replies.body_tagged:
Your opinion on me?: Known you for ages since you joined with your old account schimini (or something like that). Amazing mapmaker and staff memeber. really great person to talk with.
Also what happened to you in the last time, you seem to lost your fire..: Well I'm affraid if I post one wrong thing I'll get forum banned, so I've toned it down quite a bit since then. Since quitting MC I don't really care too much about the drama and crap like that. I still enjoy posting on the forums though. My personality chilled out after having some conversations with Para a while ago.

What was your initial intention to become a staff member?: I was really active at the time and doing a lot of mini-modding by reporting players online so I though I would give it a shot. Plus I was getting bored of playing the game at the time so moderating was a nice break.
How do you think avicus will develop in the next weeks (months, years)?: Well if Atlas does what everyone is saying Avicus could start growing again. Might take 5+ months to regain the playerbase that we lost but eventually it would br amazing.
If you could give the current admins and seniors an advice how to do their job, what would you say?: Be more interested in the community and actively post on the forums. Advertise the server. And try to keep the competitive side active.

replies.body:
Opinions on me?:  Cool dude. Well deserving of being a staff member. Really nice to talk to, but sadly we don't talk as much anymore :c (rip Cacal days). 
Where would you like to go to next time?: I don't really know yet ;p I'm a heat of the moment kind of person when it comes to making future decisions. xD
One person you would like to meet IRL from Avicus?: MasterProX. But I could technically meet the fellow Ontario peeps.
If you were the world's most powerful man, what would you do?: Wipe clean the worlds financial debt. Create one sovereign nation.

replies.body:
Opinions on me?: Known you for a while nice person, really friendly on the forums. I think I used to play a ton of Walls with your brother Corey didn't realize that until a few months ago. Don't really talk to you a lot though. ;/
Opinions on Avicus?: The community is one of the best in Minecraft, the staff (at times) are the worst. The server is great but could be a lot better.

Opinions on Avicus?
reply_to.body_tagged:
Opinions on me?
Opinions on Avicus?

replies.body:
Heyy Snow! :D
I'm gonna be original and say opinions on me?: One of the best New Zealanders to ever play this server. Funny on teamspeak but serious when it comes to feedback on the server. One of the better players to be staff on the server (although disagreed with certain choices you made ;/). You are very helpful most of the time but end up starting some flame wars. And of course Snowlas! The best ship this server ever had! :D
What do you think of the current staff team? How do you think they're going?: Can't really say too much about the server. But the forum moderation can be awful at times. From what I heard about the senior staff and the issues with teamspeak that needs a lot of improvement. 
Will you return to Avicus and the staff team in The future?: Never in a million years xD

replies.body:
Hi Poker! :D
When will Berzerk have a full roster?: Probably not for a very, very long time. Vlad is kinda forum banned ATM and will be away most of the summer so rip. I still haven't gotten my computer fixed, so I couldn't play or PvP if my life depended on it. :c Plus we haven't found enough players that fit the criteria we're looking for. ;-; Possibly some point during the summer we may have enough to do scrims.
Opinions on me?: Great team leader & amazing teammate. Serious most of the time but you would still joke around. Don't really talk to much anymore but from what I remember you were a great person to talk to. Always a great rusher. :p

replies.body:
Hola Luke!
You're a really chill dude and I've known you for well over a year. Lol I still remember you trying to get your k/d above one to be accepted into Atomic. We haven't actively talked since after the first tournament. still a very good pvper and person to talk with from what I remember. Hopefully you come back to the Legacy chat soon.

Youre a really chill gril that's fun to talk to. (: Really loved having you in Berzerk because you brought a lot of fun to practises lol. And all the chats on Skype. Hope that you come back to the legacy chat soon too.

replies.body:
opinions on me???:
Annoying troll, who spams a lot, jk. Nah youre pretty cool to chat with and actually live super close to me. I've know you wayyy back since Fancy Soldiers like 2 1/2 years ago lmao. you sometimes cross the line with comments but I know everything you say is satirical, so it doesn't offend me.
Billy Talent or Aerosmith?: 
Aerosmith, never heard Billy Talent lol
Pineapples or Peaches?:
Pineapples.
Trains or Planes???
Planes even though ive never been in one xd
